set.name: SON
set.longname: Return of the Revenge of the Son of the Terrorscope

card.name: Lagrangian Stabilizer
card.text: If an opponent would draw two or more cards, instead you draw that many cards and that player draws a card.

card.name: Kremmen, Heart of the Cosmos
card.text: ({T}: Add {U} or {R}.) Kremmen, Heart of the Cosmos enters the battlefield tapped. {UR}{UR}{UR}{UR}{UR}, {T}, Exile Kremmen: Exile target instant or sorcery card with mana value 6 or less from your graveyard and copy it. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Forrest, Obssessive Curator
card.text: As long as you control an Alien, creature spells you cast cost {G} less to cast and creatures you control have trample. The same is true for Robot, {U} and flying; and Zombie, {B} and menace.

card.name: Lieve, Cosmic Bloodwitch
card.text: [+1]: You may discard a card or sacrifice an artifact. When you do, draw a card. [-3]: Destroy target artifact or creature. Create a Treasure token. [-5]: Put target artifact or creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. When you do, create a token that's a copy of it, except has haste. Exile the token at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: The Best Bout Machine
card.text: Whenever another creature with haste or flash enters the battlefield under your control, put a cardio counter on The Best Bout Machine. Whenever The Best Bout Machine attacks, you draw X cards and each opponent loses X life, where X is the number of cardio counters on The Best Bout Machine.

card.name: Brass Cage
card.text: Permanents being put into a graveyard from the battlefield don't cause abilities to trigger.

card.name: Cosmic Passage
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Cosmic Passage: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Then if you control three or more artifacts, untap that land.

card.name: Spatial Extortion
card.text: Target opponent may pay 5 life. If they don't, draw three cards.

card.name: Scum and Villainy
card.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to each other creature and planeswalker.

card.name: Radiological Disaster
card.text: Destroy all artifacts and enchantments.

card.name: Emergency Re-Entry
card.text: Target player mills eight cards.

card.name: Cosmic Detour
card.text: Exile each creature you control. Return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Beginner's Murdergun
card.text: Equipped creature has double strike and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, create a Treasure token." (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.") Equip—Sacrifice an artifact.

card.name: A Song of Astral Ways
card.text: Each player sacrifices all nonartifact, nonland permanents they control.

card.name: Spatial Artiste
card.text: Whenever you cast an Interstellar spell, you may pay {X}, where X is that spell's mana value. If you do, copy that spell and you may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Grim Metropolis
card.text: Grim Metropolis enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, you may return target artifact you control with mana value 1 or greater to its owner's hand. When you do, untap Grim Metropolis. {T}: Add {W} or {B}.

card.name: Gravitic Rupture
card.text: Gravitic Rupture enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, you may return target artifact you control with mana value 1 or greater to its owner's hand. When you do, untap Gravitic Rupture. {T}: Add {G} or {U}.

card.name: Fresh-Faced Rookie
card.text: Lifelink Remodulate 1 (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, put its counters on another creature you control.)

card.name: Brass Mendicant
card.text: Remodulate 2 (This enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, put its counters on another creature you control.)

card.name: Federation Auxiliary
card.text: When Federation Auxiliary enters the battlefield, exile target card from a graveyard.

card.name: Reflective Wanderer
card.text: When Reflective Wanderer enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Robot Ranger creature token with remodulate 1. (It enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, put its counters on another creature you control.)

card.name: Grizzled Space Cop
card.text: When Grizzled Space Cop enters the battlefield, it opens a wormhole. (Exile an Interstellar card from your graveyard. When this becomes tapped on a later turn, you may cast the exiled card. You still pay its costs.)

card.name: Relentless Destructron
card.text: Relentless Destructron enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. {1}, Remove a counter from Relentless Destructron: Relentless Destructron gains shielded until end of turn. Tap it. (Prevent all damage that would be dealt to it.)

card.name: Hotshot Droptrooper
card.text: Flying When Hotshot Droptrooper enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Derring-Do Heartthrob
card.text: During your turn, Derring-Do Heartthrob has first strike. Whenever you cast an Interstellar spell, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Fobosian Abductor
card.text: When Fobosian Abductor enters the battlefield, exile target artifact or creature an opponent controls until Fobosian Abductor leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Forlorn Shieldtron
card.text: Flying Whenever Forlorn Shieldtron attacks, target creature you control gains shielded until end of turn. (Prevent all damage that would be dealt to it.)

card.name: Calculated Ambush
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. When you do, it deals damage equal to its power to target attacking or blocking creature.

card.name: Colossus Capsule
card.text: When Colossus Capsule enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Colossus Capsule leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Scramble, Scramble
card.text: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Break the Lightspeed Barrier
card.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Triceraton Commander
card.text: Flying Whenever Triceraton Commander attacks, other Dinosaurs you control get +1/+1 and gain flying until end of turn. When Triceraton Commander enters the battlefield, create X 2/2 white Dinosaur Soldier creature tokens.

card.name: Hyper-Precise Laser Death
card.text: Choose one. If you cast this spell from exile or from outside the game, you may choose any number instead. • Destroy all artifacts. • Destroy all battles. • Destroy all creatures. • Destroy all enchantments.

card.name: Cosmic Brickhouse
card.text: Flying When Cosmic Brickhouse enters the battlefield, exile up to two target non-Angel creatures until Cosmic Brickhouse leaves the battlefield. For each creature exiled this way, its controller creates a 1/1 colorless Robot artifact creature token.

card.name: Terraformationiser
card.text: Nonbasic lands are colorless artifacts named Mind Stone with "{T}: Add {C}." and "{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card." and lose all other types and abilities.

card.name: Luxile, Crystalline Queen
card.text: Other creatures you control get +1/+1. Whenever Luxile, Crystalline Queen deals combat damage to a player, create a token that's a copy of it, except it's an artifact and not a creature.

card.name: Buggular Hunter
card.text: Flying During your turn, Buggular Hunter has first strike. Whenever Buggular Hunter deals combat damage to a creature, exile that creature until Buggular Hunter leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Energize the Crystal Brain
card.text: Put target artifact card from a graveyard to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Planetary Rambler
card.text: This spell costs {3} less to cast as long as you control three or more artifacts. When Planetary Rambler enters the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Hero of the Federation
card.text: Hero of the Federation has vigilance along as you control an artifact, lifelink as long as you control an enchantment, and double strike as long as you control a battle or planeswalker.

card.name: Calamity Calibrator
card.text: Each creature you control with a counter on it has flying. {W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Alloyed Oppressor
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell during your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Alloyed Oppressor. Remodulate 1 (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, put its counters on another creature you control.)

card.name: Charioteer of the Gods
card.text: Vigilance, flying Whenever you cast an Interstellar spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Charioteer of the Gods.

card.name: Intrepid Cosmonaut
card.text: When Intrepid Cosmonaut enters the battlefield, destroy target creature an opponent controls with power 4 or greater.

card.name: Skyscuttler Prototype
card.text: Flying {1}, Sacrifice another creature or artifact: Skyscuttler Prototype gains lifelink and vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Rambunctious Throggler
card.text: {1}, {T}, Tap an untapped artifact you control: Tap target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Experimental Artillerist
card.text: Flash When Experimental Artillerist enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target blocking creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Molybdenum Mook
card.text: Double strike Remodulate 1 (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, put its counters on another creature you control.)

card.name: Atmospheric Skimmer
card.text: Flying Whenever Atmospheric Skimmer attacks, put a flying counter on up to one target creature that crewed it this turn. Crew 1

card.name: One More Flight
card.text: Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped with a flying counter on it.

card.name: Sun Smasher
card.text: {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Put an ordnance counter on Sun Smasher. {2}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Sun Smasher: Destroy each artifact with mana value X or less, where X is the number of ordnance counters on Sun Smasher.

card.name: Meat Processor
card.text: Flash Remodulate 1 (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, put its counters on another creature you control.)

card.name: Cyberspine Prototype
card.text: Cyberspine Prototype can't be blocked as long as it has a counter on it.

card.name: Robotronic Pulverizer
card.text: Vigilance Remodulate 2 (This enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, put its counters on another creature you control.)

card.name: Superweapon Tester
card.text: Flying When Superweapon Tester enters the battlefield, choose one — • Put a +1/+1 counter on Superweapon Tester. • Spacewar! (Encounter the top card of your cosmic deck.)

card.name: Cosmic Nightrider
card.text: Flash When Cosmic Nightrider enters the battlefield, it opens a wormhole. (Exile an Interstellar card from your graveyard. When this becomes tapped on a later turn, you may cast the exiled card. You still pay its costs.)

card.name: Apprentice Rocketman
card.text: Flying When Apprentice Rocketman enters the battlefield, it opens a wormhole. (Exile an Interstellar card from your graveyard. When this becomes tapped on a later turn, you may cast the exiled card. You still pay its costs.)

card.name: Curious Colossus
card.text: When Curious Colossus enters the battlefield, return target artifact or Interstellar card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Giant Cryoparasite
card.text: When Giant Cryoparasite enters the battlefield, spacewar! (Encounter the top card of your cosmic deck.) Giant Cryoparasite cant be blocked as long as you've encountered a phenomenon this turn.

card.name: Juke
card.text: Exile target artifact or creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: High-Altitude Catfight
card.text: Counter target spell. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control.

card.name: The Edge of Authorized Space
card.text: Draw a card. Spacewar! (Encounter the top card of your cosmic deck.)

card.name: You're Not the Android I Married
card.text: Draw two cards. Create a 1/1 black and red Robot artifact creature token with "This creature can't block."

card.name: Gaze Not Long Into the Orb
card.text: Enchant creature or artifact Enchanted permanent is a Treasure artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color," and it loses all other abilities.

card.name: Lost in Space
card.text: Target artifact or creature's owner puts it on their choice of the top or bottom of their library. Surveil 1. (To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Last Voyage of the Ironwhale
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast if it targets an artifact. Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Parallel Dimension
card.text: For each permanent on the battlefield, create a token that's a copy of that permanent.

card.name: Promethian Tinkin
card.text: Flying Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, choose one — • Put a +1/+1 counter on Promethian Tinkin. • Spacewar! (Encounter the top card of your cosmic deck.)

card.name: Consult the Dinoracle
card.text: Draw a card for each spell you've cast this turn. (Including this one.)

card.name: Drifting Cetecean
card.text: Vigilance, flying Whenever Drifting Cetecean deals combat damage to a player, draw a card. If you would draw a card other than the first one you draw in each of your draw steps, you may spacewar! instead. (To spacewar!, encounter the top card of your cosmic deck.)

card.name: Cyclotronic Aetherizer
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell, draw a card and put a stasis counter on Cyclotronic Aetherizer. Each spell you cast other than the first one you cast during each of your turns costs {X} more to cast, where X is the number of stasis counters on Cyclotronic Aetherizer.

card.name: Heart of the Robotron Queen
card.text: Artifact spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Artifact creatures you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Chronarchivist
card.text: Artifacts you control have hexproof. {T}, Tap an untapped artifact you control: Add {C}.

card.name: Crucible of Worlds
card.text: You may play lands from your graveyard.

card.name: Quarth, Academic Fraud
card.text: As long as Quarth, Academic Fraud is tapped, if an opponent would draw a card except the first one they draw in each of their draw steps instead that player skips that draw and you draw a card.

card.name: Astral Dancer
card.text: Flying Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Astral Dancer gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If it was an Interstellar spell, instead put a +1/+1 counter on Astral Dancer.

card.name: Iron Hydrazoa
card.text: Vigilance, flying

card.name: Fobosian Creepazoid
card.text: Vigilance Fobosian Creepazoid can't be blocked as long as you've cast an Interstellar spell this turn.

card.name: Gyblaxian Hunter
card.text: Gyblaxian Hunter can't be blocked by Aliens. When Gyblaxian Hunter enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card or Interstellar card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Hardboiled Hardware
card.text: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Hardboiled Hardware. Remodulate 1 (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, put its counters on another creature you control.)

card.name: Pincertronic Astrobug
card.text: Flying Pincertronic Astrobug enters the battlefield tapped. When Pincertronic Astrobug dies, you may exile it. When you do, spacewar! (Encounter the top card of your cosmic deck.)

card.name: I Have a Mouth (And I Scream)
card.text: Spacewar! three times. (To spacewar!, encounter the top card of your cosmic deck.)

card.name: Planetary Design
card.text: This spell costs {3} less to cast as long as you control three or more artifacts. Draw two cards.

card.name: Eject
card.text: This spell can't be countered. Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

card.name: Burst with Brainpower
card.text: Draw three cards.

card.name: Basking in the Time Chair
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand, one on top of your library, and one into your graveyard.

card.name: Entangled by the Thrigulon
card.text: Counter target artifact, creature, or Interstellar spell. Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Thirst for Knowledge
card.text: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an artifact card.

card.name: Abrupt Void
card.text: Choose one — • Counter target artifact spell. • Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {1}.

card.name: Virus Beetle
card.text: When Virus Beetle enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.

card.name: Bug Zapper
card.text: When Bug Zapper enters the battlefield, it opens a wormhole. (Exile an Interstellar card from your graveyard. When this becomes tapped on a later turn, you may cast the exiled card. You still pay its costs.)

card.name: Ironblood Transport
card.text: Flying When Ironblood Transport enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature. When you do, you draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

card.name: Unmanned Crustation
card.text: Unmanned Crustation enters the battlefield with a menace counter on it. Remodulate 2 (This enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, put its counters on another creature you control.)

card.name: Remorseless Timecop
card.text: {1}{B}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Return Remorseless Timecop from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Ironblood's Spy
card.text: When Ironblood's Spy enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonartifact, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

card.name: Super Trooper
card.text: Menace {2}{B}, Sacrifice another creature or artifact: Draw a card.

card.name: Leering Graspulax
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice an artifact and/or a creature. This spell costs {2} less to cast for each permanent sacrificed this way. Menace

card.name: Read-Only Megasaur
card.text: When Read-Only Megasaur enters the battlefield, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: A Lonely Place to Shut Down
card.text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: By the Light of the Moon
card.text: Target creature gets +2/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Absorbed by Psionic Creeps
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature. Draw two cards.

card.name: Fall into a Timehole
card.text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose an artifact or creature card from it. That player discards that card.

card.name: Psychotronic Spasm
card.text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker. Its controller discards a card.

card.name: Final Death
card.text: Exile target creature.

card.name: Screaming into the Void
card.text: Choose a number. When you do, each opponent may have their life total become that number. If they don't, they sacrifice that many permanents.

card.name: Return of the Revenge of the Son of the Terrorscope
card.text: (As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You can attack it.) When Return of the Revenge of the Son of the Terrorscope enters the battlefield, put up to two target creature cards from graveyards onto the battlefield under your control tapped. At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose life equal to the greatest power among creatures you control.

card.name: Rogue Trader
card.text: If you would draw one or more cards, you draw that many cards plus one instead. Whenever you draw a card, you lose life equal to the number of cards in your hand.

card.name: Cyclotronic Godmachine
card.text: Trample, menace At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature. When you do, each opponent sacrifices a creature of their choice. Remodulate 5 (This enters the battlefield with five +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, put its counters on another creature you control.)

card.name: World Without Memories
card.text: Search target opponent's graveyard, hand, and library for up to one battle card, up to one creature card, up to one enchantment card, and up to one planeswalker card and exile them. That player shuffles, then draws a card for each card exiled from their hand this way.

card.name: Hyperviolence
card.text: Choose one — • Destroy all artifact creatures. • Destroy all nonartifact creatures.

card.name: Stellar Effigy
card.text: When Stellar Effigy enters the battlefield or is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may put a permanent card not named Stellar Effigy from your hand or graveyard onto the battlefield.

card.name: Super-Fun Happy Ride
card.text: Tap an untapped creature you control: Put a charge counter on Super-Fun Happy Ride. Activate only during your turn. {2}{B}, {T}, Remove X charge counters from Super-Fun Happy Ride: Exile target creature with mana value X.

card.name: Big Robot
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact and/or creature card in your graveyard. Menace, trample

card.name: Planetary Threat
card.text: This spell costs {3} less to cast as long as you control three or more artifacts. Menace When Planetary Threat enters the battlefield, surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

card.name: Self Disassembler
card.text: When Self Disassembler enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature of their choice. Then each player who sacrificed an artifact creature this way creates a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Robot Smasher
card.text: When Robot Smasher dies, if it had counters on it, return it to the battlefield tapped at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Deathkill Murderbug
card.text: When Deathkill Murderbug dies during your turn, all creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Scuttling Annihilator
card.text: When Scuttling Annihilator enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices two creatures of their choice.

card.name: Recurring Adversary
card.text: Recurring Adversary can't block. You may cast Recurring Adversary from your graveyard by sacrificing an artifact in addition to paying its other costs.

card.name: Dreadmobile
card.text: Menace {1}, Sacrifice another artifact or creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on this Vehicle. Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Mass Quiverer
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. {B}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact or creature: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Too Many Moons
card.text: Target opponent discards two cards and loses 2 life.

card.name: Ultraviolet Ray-Beam
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice an artifact. Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If the additional cost was paid, it enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the sacrificed artifact's mana value.

card.name: Yawning Maw of the Void
card.text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. If a creature an opponent controls would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Microscopic Mayhem
card.text: Creatures have base toughness 1.

card.name: Uh Oh
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature. Destroy target creature.

card.name: Rogorbian Schemer
card.text: Menace {7}{R}: Put three +1/+1 counters on Rogorbian Schemer, then spacewar! Activate only as a sorcery and only once. (To spacewar!, encounter the top card of your cosmic deck.)

card.name: Domesticated Killbot
card.text: When Domesticated Killbot enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Blacklight Panther
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile an Interstellar card from your graveyard or pay {2}. Menace

card.name: Savage Entangler
card.text: During your turn, Savage Entangler has first strike. When Savage Entangler enters the battlefield, it opens a wormhole. (Exile an Interstellar card from your graveyard. When this becomes tapped on a later turn, you may cast the exiled card. You still pay its costs.)

card.name: Federation Courier
card.text: Interstellar spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Carnival of the Robotrons
card.text: Create three 1/1 black and red Robot artifact creature tokens with "This creature can't block."

card.name: Cold-Blooded Thriller
card.text: Cold-Blooded Thriller has menace and haste as long as you've cast an Interstellar spell this turn.

card.name: Drifting Astrofoetus
card.text: When Drifting Astrofoetus enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice another creature or artifact. When you do, this creature deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Hellworld Tyrant
card.text: Reach When Hellworld Tyrant enters the battlefield, spacewar! (Encounter the top card of your cosmic deck.) {1}{R}, Discard Hellworld Tyrant: Spacewar!

card.name: Kablammo
card.text: Kablammo deals 2 damage to target creature, planeswalker, or battle. If a creature or planeswalker dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Blast Off into Forever
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. It gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Electronic Revelation
card.text: Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.

card.name: Orbital Chaos
card.text: Choose one — • Destroy target artifact. • Spacewar! (Encounter the top card of your cosmic deck.)

card.name: Endless Trundletrain
card.text: When Endless Trundletrain enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to any target. Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Time Collapse
card.text: Time Collapse deals 6 damage to target creature, planeswalker, or battle. The damage can't be prevented.

card.name: Temporal Terminal
card.text: Whenever an artifact you control or an instant or sorcery spell you control deals damage to a player, put that many time counters on Temporal Terminal. {T}, Remove fifteen time counters from Temporal Terminal and exile it: Take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Murderization Engine
card.text: If an artifact source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals triple that damage to that permanent or player instead.

card.name: Rrroooaaarrr
card.text: Choose one — • Damage can't be prevented this turn. Rrröööaaarrr deals 3 damage to each creature and to each battle you control. • Destroy all artifacts.

card.name: Stellar Prism
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell from exile or from outside the game, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Cold-Blooded Cosmonaut
card.text: Double strike Whenever an opponent draws a card, put a +1/+1 counter on Cold-Blooded Cosmonaut.

card.name: Surge of Cosmic Power
card.text: Double target creature's power and toughness until end of turn. Until end of turn, that creature gains menace, trample, and "Whenever this creature attacks, its owner shuffles it into their library at the beginning of the next end step."

card.name: Electric Exemplar
card.text: Ward—Discard a card. (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player discards a card.) Attacking Robots you control have double strike.

card.name: King of the Mechasaurs
card.text: Flying Ward—Discard a card. {1}{R}: King of the Mechasaurs gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Whenever King of the Mechasaurs attacks, if its power is 13 or greater, spacewar! nine times. (To spacewar!, encounter the top card of your cosmic deck.)

card.name: Careful Handling
card.text: Careful Handling deals X damage to any target. If X is 6 or more, spacewar! X times. (To spacewar!, encounter the top card of your cosmic deck.)

card.name: Hyperspatial Entity
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if there are no cards exiled with Hyperspatial Entity, it opens a wormhole. (Exile an Interstellar card from your graveyard. When this becomes tapped on a later turn, you may cast the exiled card. You still pay its costs.)

card.name: Planetary Tyrant
card.text: This spell costs {3} less to cast as long as you control three or more artifacts. Menace, reach {1}{R}: Planetary Tyrant gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Ruthless Cybersaurus
card.text: Whenever Ruthless Cybersaurus attacks, defending player may have you create a Treasure token. If they don't, Ruthless Cybersaurus deals 2 damage to each opponent. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Ironblood's Assistant
card.text: Whenever you cast an artifact or Interstellar spell, Ironblood's Assistant deals 1 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Lunar Headbasher
card.text: Each other creature you control named Lunar Headbasher gets +1/+1 and has double strike.

card.name: Asteroid Miner

card.name: Poker Night with the Boys
card.text: Whenever you attack, exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn. When you do, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: If It Moves, Shoot It
card.text: If It Moves, Shoot It deals 2 damage to each nonartifact creature.

card.name: Robotronic Annihilation
card.text: Robotronic Annihilation deals 4 damage to any target. The damage can't be prevented.

card.name: Cannot a Murderbot Know Joy?

card.name: Insult the Living Planet

card.name: Contemplate Mortality

card.name: The Weight of Ages
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, return target permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Prismatic Pioneer
card.text: Whenever you tap a permanent for mana, add an additional X mana of any one color, where X is Prismatic Pioneer's power.

card.name: Omnivorous Voidwurm

card.name: Into the Gene Tanks
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice an artifact. If you do, this spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the sacrificed artifact's mana value. Search your library for a creature card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Spatial Accretion
card.text: Put all land cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield tapped under your control.

card.name: Eternity Engine

card.name: SON Draft Archetypes SON
card.text: {W}{U} REMODULATE You've beeped your last boop, cowboy. Slowly accrue counters as your creatures die. {U}{B} REMODULATE Attack aggressively and recycle the parts of your brave cannon fodder for later. {B}{R} INTERSTELLAR GRIND Open a wormhole into a reality where death and discard hurts you less than them. {R}{G} SPACEWAR RAMP Go big or go into space. Or do both. {G}{W} COUNTERS Build up your creatures with additional counters. {W}{B} INTERSTELLAR CONTROL Take control of the cosmos with interstellar wormholes. And guns. {B}{G} SACRIFICE There are always more robots. {G}{U} SPACEWAR AGGRO Apply pressure to your opponent with strong creatures, disrupting their plans with phenomena. {U}{R} SPACEWAR SPELLS Throw spells, phenomena, and alien goo at your opponent. {R}{W} INTERSTELLAR AGGRO Disrupt your foe with early spells and close the door quickly with creatures pouring out of wormholes.

card.name: Spacewar (limited) SON
card.text: To play the limited Spacewar! variant, begin the game with at least five phenomenon cards in your cosmic deck. Duplicate phenomena are allowed. Each player has their own cosmic deck. Cards are encountered only when instructed to by Spacewar! effects and are shuffled back into the deck after resolving.

card.name: Quarth, Academic Fraud (bundle promo)
card.text: As long as Quarth, Academic Fraud is tapped, if an opponent would draw a card except the first one they draw in each of their draw steps instead that player skips that draw and you draw a card.
